experiments.name: AMS0022
experiments.description:
Define gene expression signature which can differentiate human tumor cells which are sensitive or resistant
 to mTOR pathway inhibitors.
Conditions:
2 sensitive cells lines: MDA-MB-468, adherent and MOLT-4, suspension
2 resistant cell lines: HCT-15, adherent and K562, suspension
Cells were treated for 6h either with 0.1% DMSO, 10uM ACT-361649A or 10uM ACT-462736A.
3 biological replicates(on different days)
